feed.title: Dawarich Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.13.5
entry.content:
Added

  • Links to view import points on the map and on the Points page on the Imports page.

Fixed

  • The Imports page now loading faster.

Changed

  • Default value for RAILS_MAX_THREADS was changed to 10.
  • Visit suggestions background job was moved to its own low priority queue to prevent it from blocking other jobs.

ðŸ’™ This release is supported by James Manolios on Patreon ðŸ’™

What's Changed

  • Update How_to_install_Dawarich_on_Synology.md by @ghazlewood in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/226
  • Fix immich import last year by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/235

New Contributors

  • @ghazlewood made their first contribution in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/226

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.13.4...0.13.5

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.13.6
entry.content:
Fixed

  • Flatten geodata retrieved from Immich before processing it to prevent errors

ðŸ’™ This release is supported by James Manolios and chenrik on Patreon ðŸ’™

What's Changed

  • Fix/immich import validity bug by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/243

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.13.5...0.13.6

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.13.7
entry.content:
Added

  • GET /api/v1/points response now will include X-Total-Pages and X-Current-Page headers to make it easier to work with the endpoint
  • The Pages point now shows total number of points found for provided date range

Fixed

  • Link to Visits page in notification informing about new visit suggestion

ðŸ’™ This release is supported by James Manolios and chenrik on Patreon ðŸ’™

What's Changed

  • Convert the headers to string by @sunstep in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/250
  • Add pagination headers to the API response by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/247
  • Fix/visits notificaton url by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/246

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.13.6...0.13.7

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.14.0
entry.content:
Added

  • 17 new tile layers to choose from. Now you can select the tile layer that suits you the best. You can find the list of available tile layers in the map controls in the top right corner of the map under the layers icon.

ðŸ’™ This release is supported by James Manolios and chenrik on Patreon ðŸ’™

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.13.7...0.14.0
